text: Tara pichata ami kitabara adhikarai karailo te'omlokaka, yisakalaka ami amara bandasakalara majara paraa manonita karaicho; kintu sihamtara majara kichumana nijara prati atyacarai, kichumana madhyamapanthi arau kichumana allahara icchata kalyanara kamata agragami. E'itorae'i haiche maha anugraha
